subtests.name: :user-invalid selector should respond to user action
:user-invalid selector properly interacts with submit & reset buttons
required-input: A required input or textarea should match :user-invalid if a user types into it and then clears it before blurring.
required-textarea: A required input or textarea should match :user-invalid if a user types into it and then clears it before blurring.
A required checkbox should match :user-invalid if the user unchecks it and blurs.
